highlights: Designed the low-level architecture for a payment integration system, defining transaction flow, retry handling, and failure scenarios
Implemented payment workflows using third-party APIs, enabling secure transactions and automated invoice generation
Added Redis-backed idempotency handling to deduplicate repeated payment requests and prevent duplicate processing during retries
Developed a secure digital vault platform allowing users to store, manage, and share encrypted notes and documents
Integrated JWT and OAuth2-based authentication to ensure secure access and session handling across user workflows
Enabled scalable file uploads using AWS S3 pre-signed URLs, storing object keys in the database and eliminating backend file handling
